cab.content: 0NFIDENT1AL -I(P 203)From Viceroy, 6th January 1920.(Received 8th, 12.4-5 p.m.)Priority A.26 S. Very friendly letter, elated 27th December, received from Amir thankingme for recognition of Afghan envoy and for excellent treatment accorded to latter,and expressing renewed hope of durable friendship. Letter of same date fromMahmud Tarsi to Foreign Secretary, thanks him for letter informing him of ordinanceprohibiting possession of rouble notes, expatiates on heavy loss which this will causeto Afghan merchants, and suggests that some better arrangement might be devised which would set the minds of merchants and capitalists of two Governments at rest.
